structural_unit_name.en: School of Theology and Religious Studies

description.en: In this seminar the doctoral student carries out in the close cooperation with the supervisor the analysis of the most relevant sources and literature connected with the particular topic.
description.et: Seminaris viib doktorant tihedas koostöös juhendajaga läbi uurimisteema analüüsi parimate teadaolevate allikate ja kirjanduse kaasabil.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to extend  and deepen the knowledge of the doctoral student in a topic closely connected with the theme of the dissertation. Doctoral student cooperates with supervisor in getting to know about the methods and materials needed for this particular research topic.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on täiendada ja süvendada doktorandi teadmisi tema väitekirjaga seotud teemal. Doktorant tutvub koostöös juhendajaga tema uurimistööks vajalike meetodite ja materjalidega.

learning_outcomes.en: A doctoral candidate who has completed the course:
1. is able to find theological scientific information;
2. is able to apply theoretical knowledge in solving the research problems;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab rakendada teoreetilisi teadmisi uurimisprobleemide lahendamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. is able to express problems arising in the application of theoretical knowledge.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab sõnastada probleeme teoreetiliste teadmiste rakendamisel.

description.et: Juhendaja hindab doktorandi edasijõudmist valitud meetodite omandamisel ja materjalide läbitöötamisel.
